text:
Hello <@UDLS0CYPP>

HubSpot not provide section custom class functionality.
It does actually! You can apply custom classes to section partials and that section will retain the class even if the contents change. Give me a sec and I'll dig up documentation and an example
Here's a messy demo video displaying how this works -
And here's the corresponding HS documentation
Really sorry, half of that video is me flailing around trying to get the plus sign to show up so I could add in the section
